column7: The Junior Recital represents the third-year applied music project for students majoring in a music performance program after completing two years of applied music study. A public recital is given during the junior year. Approved for S/U grading only. May be repeated if recital program differs, and with permission of applied music instructor. Prerequisite: Minimum of four semesters of applied music study, concurrent enrollment in the appropriate 400-level applied music course, and permission of the applied music instructor.
